elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.dar: The higher the value, the lesser the damage given is. Damage dealt follows the following formula : value + (baseWeaponDamage * darkAspectLevel / darkAspectPowerNerf). Default : 3.0 Min : 1.0 Max : 5.0
The higher the value, the lesser the damage received is. Damage received follows the following formula : value + value / darkCursePowerNerf. Default : 3.0 Min : 1.0 Max : 5.0
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.ear: Power factor for other entities (Earth aspect)
The higher the value, the more the attacked entity goes higher vertically. Vertical velocity follows the following formula : earthAspectPowerFactorPlayer * level. Default : 0.05 Min : 0.01 Max : 1.0
The higher the value, the more the attacked player goes higher vertically. Vertical velocity follows the following formula : earthAspectPowerFactorPlayer * level. Default : 0.175 Min : 0.01 Max : 1.0
The higher the value, the more the damage dealt by a weapon with this enchantment. Default : 2.5 Min : 1.0
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.ele: The higher the value, the slower the projectile moves when shot. Projectile speed follows the following formula : elecAspectlevel / elecAspectSpeedNerf. Default : 1.25 Min : 1.0 Max : 2.0
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.fir: The higher the value, the longer the entity stays on fire after removing the cursed armor piece. Time in seconds. Default : 2 Min : 1.0
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.fro: The higher the value, the longer the attacked entity stays frozen. Time in ticks. Duration follows the following formula : frostAspectLevel * frostAspectFrozenTickTime. Default : 150 Min : 50 Max : 200
The higher the value, the longer the entity stays frozen after removing the cursed armor piece. Time in ticks. Default : 300 Min : 100
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.lig: The higher the value, the lesser the damage given is. Damage dealt follows the following formula : value + (baseWeaponDamage * lightAspectLevel / lightAspectPowerNerf). Default : 3.0 Min : 1.0 Max : 5.0
The higher the value, the lesser the damage received is. Damage received follows the following formula : value + value / lightCursePowerNerf. Default : 3.0 Min : 1.0 Max : 5.0
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.mis: In order to modify the enchantments values, you must install the MidnightLib mod. Do you want to?
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.sou: WARNING : Works only on integrated servers (solo) or multiplayer servers ! This does not disable this mod's sound effects clientside !
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.par: WARNING : Works only on integrated servers (solo) or multiplayer servers ! This does not disable this mod's particles clientside !
elementalenchantments.midnightconfig.win: The higher the value, the lesser close the entity will be. Velocity follows the following formula on each axis : distanceBetweenEntities / windAspectPowerNerf * level. Default : 15 Min : 1 Max : 20
The higher the value, the more the attacked entity will be receive velocity. Default : 1.25 Min : 1.0 Max : 2.0
enchantment.elementalenchantments.dark_a: Boosts the weapon's damage by night, takes more durability damage by day.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.dark_c: Damage taken by night is boosted. Has a 'secret' effect.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.earth_: Attacked entities on ground are sent upwards.
Projectiles shot have no speed, gives the some close combat damage to the weapon.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.elec_a: Projectiles shot with a bow, or crossbow, are faster.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.elec_c: On a thunderstorm, when hit, lightning spawns on the wearer.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.fire_c: When on fire, it never stops.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.frost_: Freezes attacked entity, as if they're in snow powder.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.light_: Boosts the weapon's damage by day, takes more durability damage by night.
Damage taken by day is boosted. Has a 'secret' effect.
enchantment.elementalenchantments.wind_c: Deals a lot of knockback to attacked entities. Also cancels any damage dealt.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.elemental: Adds simple elemental enchantments & curses to the game
